title: [Client] If you press a button on the Honor screen too quickly, the client breaks
body:
And by "breaks" I mean you can't click on it. The cursor occasionally switches between default pointer and the ["clickable link" pointing hand](https://previews.123rf.com/images/rclassenlayouts/rclassenlayouts1201/rclassenlayouts120100525/12494422-black-and-whitevector-mouse-cursor-hand.jpg), but it is totally unresponsive to clicks. I can still navigate with Tab to e.g. type in chat, but the only buttons I can actually click are the ones in the title bar (help, minimize, settings, exit). The only way to fix it that I've found is to exit and restart the client, which of course makes it impossible to e.g. report a player.

This is happening consistently.
